Trump says and does anything to get attention. Anyone who studies this guy knows that this was his plan years ago and he even talked about how to dominate the media. So he is constantly in the news and the other candidates are forced to talk about him a lot...so it sucks the air out of their ability to get a reasonable share of airtime....and when they do get it often they are on the defense. It is absolutely brilliant strategy...his actual reality TV experience preped him nicely for this. Only this time it is NOT reality TV...it is the Presidency of the US...not a game...not """"Your Fired""""...or who gets """"Kicked off the Island"""".
Facebook ripping people off again? No way!!!! He's always been a crook
